issue.title: [Rust] Add convenience methods to Schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8241](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8241). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to add the following methods to Schema to make it easier to work with.

 
```java

pub fn field_with_name(&self, name: &str) -> Result<&Field>;

pub fn index_of(&self, name: &str) -> Result<usize>;
```
